original_text: I will also smite mine hands together, and I will cause my fury to rest: I the Lord have said it.
korean_text: 나도 내 손뼉을 치며 내 분노를 다 풀리로다 나 여호와가 말하였노라

sentences.original_text: I will also smite mine hands together
sentences.korean_translation: 나도 내 손을 함께 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: and I will cause my fury to rest
I the Lord have said it
